alert.note: Alert for Schleicher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 4:07PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL SCHLEICHER AND NORTHWESTERN SUTTON COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 407 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Intersection Of I-10 And Ranch Road 1989, or 8 miles northwest of Sonora, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Sonora, Us-277 Near The Sutton- Schleicher County Line, and The Intersection Of I- 10 And Ranch Road 1989. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 388 and 410. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
